oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A Trip for the Homeland
رحلة من أجل الوطن
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Shafik, Doria
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this article, the President of the Bint Al Nil Union, Doria Shafiq talks about her trip to the civilized world where she revealed the role of women in building modern Egypt.
تتحدث هذه المقالة عن قيام الدكتورة درية شفيق برحلة حول العالم المتحضر لشرح الدور العظيم الذي اضطلعت به المرأة المصرية في بناء مجد مصر الحديثة.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Rare Books and Special Collections Library; The American University in Cairo
oai_dc:dc.dc:rights: Women and Memory Forum are copyright holders of the Bint al-Nil Journal Collection.
